caption:
This photograph portrays an industrial scene set in a lush, green landscape. In the foreground, there is a calm body of water reflecting the sky and surroundings. To the right of the picture, there is a pile of dark-colored stones and some scattered pieces of wood debris, suggesting either construction or mining activity.

The main focus of the image lies in the middle ground, which features a large factory complex with several multi-story buildings. Various chutes and connection points between the buildings suggest that this is possibly a processing plant or a manufacturing facility. Smoke, likely steam, can be seen emitting from a tall stack, indicating active production.

The background is framed by wooded hills that rise gently behind the factory, contributing to a scenic yet contrasting view of industry and nature. The overcast sky and the presence of the dense flora indicate a likely temperate climate. Overall, the scene captures a moment of industrial activity amidst natural surroundings, possibly highlighting issues related to industrial impact on the environment.
title: Remains of lake sanford at tahawus, in the Adirondack Forest Preserve, which as been filled with titanium tailings from nl industries
